title: AN ACT relating to undesignated glucagon.
subject: Children and Minors
Civil Actions
Diseases
Drugs and Medicines
Education, Elementary and Secondary
Nurses
Pharmacists
Physicians and Practitioners
Teachers

abstracts.abstract: Create new sections of KRS Chapter 217 to define terms; permit health care practitioners to prescribe and dispense undesignated glucagon in the name of a school or to a trained individual; permit trained individuals to receive, possess, and administer undesignated glucagon during diabetic medical emergencies; permit schools to stock undesignated glucagon; provide for immunity from civil liability for any personal injury resulting from good faith actions to use undesignated glucagon to treat diabetic medical emergencies.
